subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Chris Duhon dealt 12 assists with no turnovers while making a key 3-pointer as the Knicks staved off the Wizards on Friday at the Verizon Center.
snippet: Chris Duhon dealt 12 assists with no turnovers while making a key 3-pointer as the Knicks staved off the Wizards on Friday at the Verizon Center.
